question: Most fungi get organic compounds from what?

nodes.text: Inorganic material is what most fungi get organic compounds from.
Living organisms are the source of organic compounds for most fungi.
Carnivorous organisms are what most fungi get organic compounds from.
Dead organisms are the source of organic compounds for most fungi.
